CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Despite various sizes of alkyl side chains attached , polymers with the same backbone show very similar XRD patterns.

Let's think step by step.

1. Polymers
2. Alkyl side chains

The polymers are the primary material or substance being discussed in the paragraph. The "alkyl side chains" are the specific material or chemical groups attached to the backbone of the polymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymers |
| Alkyl side chains |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Despite various sizes of alkyl side chains attached , polymers with the same backbone show very similar XRD patterns.

Let's think step by step.

1. Alkyl side chains: These are the hydrocarbon chains attached to the main backbone of the polymers. They vary in size.
2. Polymers: These are the large molecules made up of repeating subunits.
3. Backbone: This refers to the main structure or framework of the polymer molecule.

So, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Alkyl side chains
2. XRD patterns (X-ray diffraction patterns)
3. Sizes
4. Polymers
5. Backbone.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. XRD patterns (X-ray diffraction patterns)
2. Sizes (of alkyl side chains)
3. Polymers
4. Backbone

So, the relevant "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. XRD patterns
2. Sizes (of alkyl side chains)
3. Polymers (as a material)
4. Backbone (as a material property).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| X-ray diffraction patterns (XRD patterns) |
| Sizes (of alkyl side chains) |
| Polymers |
| Backbone |

The "Property Values" in this paragraph are the sizes of the alkyl side chains.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Sizes of alkyl side chains.

The only entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to a material property value is the sizes of the alkyl side chains.
